version_description:
* Option to log in has been added which could combine with various platforms
-You are able to move your account into another device
* Stability of the Game has been improved.
* New package products has been added
* Phrase has been modified that could make confused the players related with Connecting account function.
* Adjusting the image that is missed of red-dot notification on new stage related with Dungeon UI

* Option to log in has been added which could combine with various platforms
-You are able to move your account into another device
* Stability of the Game has been improved.
* New package products has been added
* Phrase has been modified that could make confused the players related with Connecting account function.
* Adjusting the image that is missed of red-dot notification on new stage related with Dungeon UI

- Bug related with loading issue that happened spontaneously has been modified.
- Bugs that aren't activated automatically for a few times has been modified.
- Bug related with unable to transfer account has been modified.

- Bug related with loading issue that happened spontaneously has been modified.
- Bugs that aren't activated automatically for a few times has been modified.
- Bug related with unable to transfer account has been modified.

1. 24 brand new SS grade costumes are added.
2. Some conditions for getting costumes get lowered.
3. In Monster card, ability of Riverside get nerfed due to the balance.
4. We have added "Notice system". Please check out your mailbox.
